Bioshock Infnite is a beautiful and thoroughly enjoyable game. 

The world of Colombia is fascinating. After playing through the collapsed Rapture in Bishock 1, it was refreshing to have a nice looking city to walk through with people. The music is very good, especially in the in-game music that is intergrated throughout the city. The characters are superb, especially Elizabeth. The narrative is interesting and I was enthralled and captivated to the very end. The gameplay has been refined since the original Bioshock, and I thought it was really fun. 

Clash in the Clouds (DLC) is a fun, arena style mode with various maps and challenges, and all weapons/vigors avaliable to choose from. It comes with a museum to curate with statues, artwork, music etc. 

Burial at Sea (DLC) returns to Rapture before the events of the orignal Bioshock. It was interesting and adds some new game dynamics, such as more stealth orientated gameplay. I liked seeing Rapture in its glorious heyday, but with signs of what is to come.

Un  gran juego con una de las mejores historias para algun videjojuego una jugavilidad justa y detalles extraordinarios.... pero  llega a tener bajones mas en las peleas grandes  y algunos bug pero nada que impida disfrutar una experiencia unica

โห มันอัดอั้นจริงๆ ต้องมาเขียน รีวิว คือ ชอบตั้งแต่เนื้อเรื่องหลักแล้ว 

ไม่ว่าระบบการต่อสู้ การดำเนินเนื้อเรื่อง ฉาก แสง สี ฉากคัทซีน การแสดงสีหน้าอารมณ์ของ npc คือรักเลยอ่ะ ไหนตัวเกมส์จะยัด แม่สาวจอมโมเอะ อลิซาเบท มาให้อีก เอาใจไปเลยค่ะ 555555

เนื้อเรื่อง ก็โคตร แฟนตาซี เอาไปคุยกันได้อีกนาน ไม่ว่าจะภาคไหนๆ ก็ยังคงความเข้าใจยาก ชวนคิดให้ได้เสมอ 

แล้วผมเพิ่งมีกำลังทรัพย์จัด burial at sea คือ อยากได้มานานแล้ว แต่ตอนนั้นไปติดเกมส์อื่นอยู่ เราขอโทษนะ 55555

อยากจะบอกว่า ทีมงานก็ยังมีทีเด็ดไว้ เซอร์ไพร เราๆ ไว้ใน dlc อีกด้วย นั่นก็คือ อลิซซาเบท น่ารักขึ้นแบบ สึสๆ โตเป็นสาวเต็มตัวเลยทีเดียว ผมนี้ กด f12 เพลินเลย 

เอ้ย ไม่ใช่ 55555  หมายถึง ก็ยังคง ความเข้าใจยากและชวนคิดให้เราได้อีก  โดยเป็นการ เล่าในอีก โลกอื่นๆ โดยมีตัวละครที่เราคุ้นเคย ช่วยในการให้เราอยากติดตาม 

ทั้ง dlc มี salt ใหม่ หรือก็ พลังในมือซ้าย และก็ปืนใหม่ๆ ให้เล่นอีกด้วย ที่ว่าคุ้มค่า dlc คือซื้อมาดู อลิซซาเบทโตขึ้น ผมว่า คุ้มแล้ว55555555

ทั้งนี้ เพื่อนผม หาข่าวบอกว่า ตัวผู้พัฒนานั้น ได้ปิดจ็อบเกมส์นีี้ไว้แล้ว  ผมจึงอยากใคร่ขอวอน พี่ พี่มาทำต่อเถอะนะ ผมรักเกมส์พี่มาก555555555

ทั้งนี้ ยังมีการที่ว่า ผู้ที่มี bioshock 1-2 อยู่ในคลังแล้ว คุณจะได้ ภาค remastered ไปเลย ฟรีๆ เย้ๆๆ555555 นี้เป็นการบ่งบอกได้เลยว่า เขาอยากที่จะนำเสนอผลงาน ไม่ใช่ นำเสนอราคาเกมส์ มั้งนะ เข้าข้างไปป่าวหว่ะ 555555

สุดท้ายนี้ ถึง ภาค infinite และ burial at sea จะเป็น ฉากสุดท้ายของ bioshock เราก็จะจดจำในความสุดยอดของนายไว้นะ 55555

ขอแสดงความชาบู 10.97/10  

0.97 นี้ให้เพราะ อลิซซาเบท เลย5555555555

เนื้อเรื่องยอดเยี่ยม ตัวละครมีการออกแบบลักษณะและนิสัยที่เป็นเอกลักษณ์อย่างบอกไม่ถูก
ตัวหลักของเรา มีพลังพิเศษ ที่สามารถปรับใช้ได้อย่างอิสระ และระบบกราฟฟิกที่สวย
การสร้างฉากเมืองลอยฟ้า โคลัมเบียสวยงามมากเป็นการผสมผสานระหว่างศาสตร์และศิลป์เข้ากันได้อย่างลงตัว ความไฮเทคและความสวยงามของอดีต เหมือนเมืองลอยฟ้า โคลัมเบียเป็นเหมือน การจำลองเมืองยุคเก่ามาผสมกับนวัตกรรมใหม่

ตัวหลักผู้หญิง อลิซาเบธ น่ารักและถูกสร้างให้มี Dynamic ของตัวละคร
การใช้ทฏษดีโลกคู่ขนานได้อย่างดีเยี่ยม 
และเนื้อเรื่องที่มี Dynamic มีตัวเลือกที่จะเปลี่ยนไปตามการกระทำของเราได้

เกมนี้ถ้าคนที่ชอบเสพเนื้อเรื่อง และคิดจะซื้อ แนะนำให้ลองเอามาเล่นจะไม่ผิดหวัง

Homework? Essay? Reading? Nah Bioshock Infinite's plot is way harder to understand. I spent more time on researching BioShock's plot than on my papers.

Worth spending an entire weekend on this and not preparing for classes the following week.

If it weren't a BioShock game, I might have liked it better.

I'll skip the poetic details and get straight into my gripes, in no specific order:
-Repetitive gameplay that provides little challenge, even on the hardest difficulty.
-Extremely linear level design that provides no challenge for advancing the game.
-Whereas the previous BioShock games had level design that could convincable be used as a city, Infinite's Columbia
 wouldn't be mistaken for an actual city in a hundred years. Each area was clearly designed solely to be a combat arena, with the mere aesthetic of a city.
-Boring, generic characters that all fit at least one archetypical mold.
-The story, though sort of interesting in its own right, was predictable, anticlimactic, and ultimately strayed too far from the original BioShock storyline.
-The "vigors" we too powerful, the AI was unintelligent, and the weapon/"vigor" upgrade system was way too easy to access, all of which leads back into the point of unchallenging gameplay.
-The hacking system has been removed entirely.
-Alternate Ammo Types have been removed (the Vox Varients could arguably be "ammo types," but that's stretching it).
-The shield system makes the game very easy (ProTip: Invest in shields, not HP. Shields regenerate).
-When your health does manage to get too low, you have to rely on Elizibeth for aid, because Health Packs have been removed.
-Elizibeth's ability to open "tears" that give you another advantage in the fight were pure cheese.
-Most of the weapons were far outshined by other weapons (I used the Carbine and Triple-R the whole game).
-The "Equipment System" is a crappy reissue (downgrade, imo) of the Gene Tonic system.
-The "Boss Enemies" are not a challenge.
-There was only one real boss fight (two, if you count that the same boss is used twice).
and lastly, and most firmly,
-The Skylines. Whilst on them, you are practically invulnerable. When diving from them, your attack is a one hit kill. If a Skyline is in one of the fighting areas, I cheesed it to no end because why shouldn't I? That's what it's there for.

All in all, the game would have been better had it not been called a BioShock game, but that only alleviates any problems I had with story and/or systems crossed over from previous games being changed for the worse (gene tonics to equipment, health packs to Elizibeth giving you health, etc.). 
The DLCs are actually more fun than the base game, but they are woefully short.

I would recommend this game to Matthew Perry, the actor that portrayed Chandler in the extremely over-rated SitCom "FRIENDS."

Short summary: best story in Bioshock games so far, but worst gameplay.

First, I will list everything that went wrong with Bioshock Infinite:
[list]
    [*]Levels are mostly linear: just run and gun from point A to B, very little incentive to explore. There are no level maps. With the ability to ride sky lines, Bioshok Infinite is literally a rail shooter.
[*]In rare cases when you find some "secret" stuff, game lists it as a secondary objective: "you found a closed box, go look for the key". Thankfully, there's no path marker leading to the key.
[*]No combination locks. Instead you pick up generic lockpicks and use them to unlock any locked door or safe. There's one door locked with obligatory 0451 code, but it's opened in a cutscene without player's input.
    [*]You can only carry two weapons. If you run out of ammo for both equipped guns, you're forced to run around the battlefield and search for a new weapon to swap or sit in cover and wait until Elizabeth throws a loaded weapon at you. There is only one ammo type per weapon.
    [*]Weapons and their upgrades are more boring now: ordinary pistols, shotguns, grenade launchers etc. Upgrades do not change how the weapon looks. No more crazy revolvers with two cylinders, electric shotguns and spear launchers.
[*]No passive tonics. Partially replaced by gear, but it's limited to four slots total: hat, shirt, pants and boots, with no ability to increase this limit. Also you cannot mix and match any effects as you wish, as every gear piece can only be equipped in its designated slot.
[*]No first aid kits or EVE hypos. When you're getting low on health in a fight you're have to drop everything and run around searching for a tear with health packs or you're dead. The're a small shield that regenerates when not under attack, but enemies destroy it in couple of hits (on hard difficulty at least).
[*]No vita chambers. You're probably wondering why is it a bad thing - it's because in previous two games vita chambers could be disabled in settings. In Infinite you have no choice but to accept your "revival" and lose money in the process. There are no manual saves anymore too, so there are no reasonable way to bypass that if you liked to play without vita chambers before. 
    [*]Hacking was removed. There's a plasmid (or vigour, how they call them here) that serves a similar purpose, but it only works for a short time and huge drain on salt (EVE). Using it on a vending machine makes it drop a small amount of money instead of decreasing sell prices.
[/list]

I'm still recommending to play Bioshock Infinite for the story - it's worth it regardless of shooting mechanics and exploration. Just set the difficulty to easy, don't repeat my mistake.

Bioshock Infinite smugly pats itself on the back for giving the player fewer choices than Bioshock and gets praised as an intelligent game for intelligent gamers. Intelligent gamers who overlook terrible AI, bland combat and gunplay, and dull level design for some pretty assets and a tryhard 2deep4you storyline exploring Ken Levine's inconsistent logic.
Got me into the series after years of putting it off, and it just might be one of my favourite games of all time, played it through in one night and I suggest you do the same for the full experience.

Bioshock Infinite is a pre-sequel from the original game, and it's storyline was way better than Bioshock and Bioshock 2. (not neglecting, the first Bioshock was the best in my personal overall rating, by it's impact) It's because the brand-new engine made the game extremely MORE IMMERSIVE.

 And honestly...by it's development resources back then. Bioshock and Bioshock 2 were just perfect!

 This game was the proof that the creators really could do the impossible, make mighty Bioshock Trilogy even better! By keeping up same visual and gameplay style, just making the game's story more immersive, with cutscenes, dialogues, choices and stuff. (all what was possibly left to improve)

 This isn't just a videogame, it's a fucking masterpiece!
 
 Next step to achieve total sucess is to make a movie with it's story.

 One more thing...Rapture > Columbia. Thanks.

Bioshock serisinin son muhteşem oyunu "Bioshock Infinite".ilk başta oyunun bende büyük bir etki bıraktığını söylemek isterim. Hikayesi mükemmel seviyede bundan dolayı hikayesi hakkında en ufak bir spoiler vermekten kaçınacagım inceleme boyunca.

Bioshock ilk oyunuyla birlikte hikayesi ile bizleri içine çeken bir first person shooter tarzında kendine has dünya tasarımı olan görev odaklı ama mevcut dunya içerisinde sizi rahat bırakıyor. Bioshock infinite ise önceki oyunlardaki dünya tasarimina benzer ama gelişen teknoloji ile göze daha hoş gelen grafikler sunmuş. Önceki oyunlardan biraz daha farklı oynanış mekaniklerine sahip fakat buna da çabuk alışıyorsunuz. Rupture de bizi denizin derinlillerine götüren Bioshock, Bioshock infinite ile bizi gökyüzü semalarında uçmakta olan bir şehirde maceranın içine yollamış. Hikayesi hakkinda bilgi paylaşmayacagımı söylemiştim fakat oyunda biraz ilerledikten sonra yanınıza gelecek olan Elizabeth sizi resmen kendine aşık edecek (sakın ha karakteriniz aşık olmasin ! 😊 ) 

İngilizce takip etmesi zor olduğundan OyunÇeviri.com ekibinin hazırlamış olduğu Türkçe yamayı indirip kurabilirsiniz.

Evet gelelim oyun süresine oyun süresi yaklaşık 12 saat kadar. ( Bunu kendi oyun tarzima dayanarak söylüyorum. Genelde loot için cok fazla dolaşırım) Size sakın az gelmesin tüm inceleme boyunca sürekli söylediğim gibi hikayesi size gereken hazzı veriyor zaten. Oyunu bitirince yeni bir zorluk seviyesi açılıyor fakat onu belli bir sure sonra oyunu özleyince oynamak istedigim icin oynamadim. Dlc leri ise indirim zamaninda alabilirsiniz sizi rupturu ozlediginizi anlamis yapimcilar 😋

The best modern Bioshock, it combines the best traits of the first two games and has a strong identity of its own. The setting is as good as Rapture and the characters are unique, the story has twists that keep you interested till the end, gameplay is solid. A must play!

Played through on release but decided to get it for Steam and play through in 1999 mode. Loved it again, a great adventure set in a fantastical location. Excellent combat and a good challenge in 1999 mode. Lots of collectibles that flesh out the narrative and a properly emotional end. Having Elizabeth along for the ride turns a good game into a great one.
serinin en kolay az gerilimli olanı genede atmosfer güzel bioshock zirvede bitiriyorsunuz ...

Oyun hikaye olarak mükemmel derecede,oynanışı sıkmıyor fps tarzı boğucu değil efektler canlı ve güzel. Aldığıma kesinlikle pişman değilim gerçekten harika bir oyun ama sonunda kafa karışıklığı içinde ekrana bakakalıyorsunuz
This game made me think twice about having gambling debt

每次重玩，都会被初见哥伦比亚时的那个场景震撼到，并且义无反顾的走上这既定命运的旅途。
伊丽莎白，别怕，我来了。

ps.玩完了海葬，我只想说一句：干tm的Atlas！！
Trop Bien !!
Норм.

Я пришел выкачивать из маленьких девочек наркоту, а меня подбросило в воздух...

Потом я убивал родителей какой-то инфантильной симпотяги....

На меня нападали механические Линкольны и Вашингтоны, вооруженные миниганами...

Я реально видел там Валуева! Мне не померещилось...

В Колумбии не одевайте скользкую обувь...

Не паркуйте канонерки около площадей, мойки нынче дороги...



А так, игра просто отличная, просто 8 из 10.... Магия, сумашедшие, негры, танцы и вокзал!
개인적으로 스토리 이해가 어렵지만 묘하게 끌리는 게임이다. (엘리자베스 보는게임.)

The second best bioshock game.

Great setting, dull combat.

15小时本体加DLC通关，这是我玩过的剧情最好的游戏，也是我喜欢的第一款蒸汽朋克风格的游戏

9.7/10
+ 曲折的剧情，喜欢多元宇宙与时间旅行的小伙伴一定不能错过
+ 画面不俗，氛围烘托良好，一款游戏可以同时体验到小清新和恐怖的氛围（但booker貌似没有影子，应该是bug）
+ 最好的AI系统，没有之一。B社的NPC跟随系统完全是渣渣

- 无论是本体还是dlc结局都太惨了吧，感到制作组满满的恶意
- 中国元素的错误借用，我知道这是架空历史，但“扶清灭洋”也得是繁体字吧
海葬DLC难度略大
Play it on hard, pay close attention to the story, and there's no possible way you can be dissapointed by the time you've finished. This was my first Bioshock game and I absolutely loved it.
剧情真烧脑啊，玩得时候千万不要去看剧透，好好体验这个游戏。是个不可多得的好游戏，画面、人物、剧情、战斗系统都非常优秀而且不落俗套
Muy bueno, lo recomiendo.

Um dos melhores jogos q ja joguei. Historia e gameplay otimos, tanto no jogo principal quanto nas dlc, q alias recomendo a compra. Compra sem arrependimentos. 
Ele ainda mora no meu coração

edit: mesmo depois de anos esse jogo ainda continua ótimo
ending was shit good game tho 5/10
Got this on sale, but still would've payed the 30 dollars for it. Worth it.

I have no words to describe how amazing this game is.
The plot is breathtaking, the graphics are amazing and the setting is perfect.

Я люблю эту игру. Лично для меня она - шедевр. Шедевр во всех смыслах - в плане музыки, в плане графики, оформления локаций, в плане сюжета. До последнего я даже не догадывалась, чем закончится эта история. А между тем, сюжетные перипетии оказались ещё сложнее, чем я думала после прохождения. И разве это не великолепно? В общем, эта игра бесконечно прекрасна.
真的好玩。射击手感还行，就是身为线性FPS还要一路翻箱倒柜有累（RPG玩家职业病）。伊丽莎白很萌，剧情很复杂，尽管早就被剧透，但也没弄的很明白。看了剧情解析才大致明白（一个人搞事情，自己搞自己）
One of the best First Person Shooters I've ever played. Seriously.
Congratulations you guys about that game.
